text: "This Man Is Mine" is a 1982 song by American hard rock band Heart and is the lead single from their sixth studio album Private Audition. It went to number 16 in the Billboard Mainstream Rock chart, number 18 in the Netherlands, number 29 on the Cash Box chart and number 33 in the United States. == References == Category:1982 songs Category:Heart (band) songs
title: This Man Is Mine (song)
